IX.iii.1.D.7.b
.
Sales in the Course of Business
If a beneficiary who operates a business sells property or merchandise in connection with the business, add any profit received from sale of the property to other income of the business.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section D - Parentsâ€™ Dependency and Indemnity Compensation (DIC) Authorization
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section D
